name: "Gnash, Your Teeth"
description:
This is a total WIP, but you can play the short sort of demo thing I have going on.

I know there are bugs / glitches in this thing, but I haven't had time to fix it. Most notably there are issues because of the character sprite resizing and I sort of hacked together a passable situation before remembering plugins exist.

If you want more information on the game or characters, click here!
